name: Warmth
text:
Warmth
by Pergalis Palix


From Cyrodiil I hail / the Imperial heart But my heart longs for one / who calls the east her home Through forest and valley / lush wood and blue river To the hard land of ash / I would go to see her The softest voice to call / my name with tender lips

Trace the curves of her form / outline of her beauty To memorize the shape / a figure so lovely The arches of her feet / the arch of an eyebrow Double arches heaving / rise and fall of her chest Face and flank the roundness / of wonderous full cheeks

In lingering darkness / I would inhale slowly Almost I could taste it / wine we had shared again And deeper, more primal / the sweat dried on her skin Perfumes enticing still / sweetly smelling her hair Other scents undescrib'd / lower under the sheets

Half century she had / twice the years I had earn'd And still so beautiful / I cannot stay away Every journey a risk / a danger I must meet Though I love its daughter / Morrowind loves me not The dead are sacred here / and I a blasphemer

This land is not my home / but for her I must stay Happiness forever / awaits in her embrace And our passion calls me / and I cannot deny Life and limb to see her / to touch her naked shape Seems a fair trade to me / to one so full of love

But other smells and sights / had waited to greet me Other forms next to hers / Alongside and atop Thrust and grunt obscenely / and leave their sweat on her Every journey a risk / because the heart is weak And youthful ashen whores / will part their legs for all

Together next we were / and I offer'd embrace Fingers wrapped lovingly / about her slender throat She had no air to scream / her eyes began to dim Then my hands loos'd themselves / and I watch'd her as old Rise and fall of her chest / peaceful as if sleeping

A bruise grew at her neck / though blended with her skin Gently I lay beside / and had her as before So like a corpse she was / unconscious but still warm Waiting for direction / needing animation I shudder and finish / and wait in the darkness

Her eyes flutter open / a smile parts her blue lips Her mouth gives shape to words / body push'd against me "Always so exciting / my forbidden lover" The smile turned savage / and she tasted my flesh "I so enjoy our games / filthy Necromancer"
